history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: ex_series_Rabs. qsimpl time: 1 use: ex_series_Rabs.

exceptions.exn: In environment a : nat -> R H : forall n : nat, a n <> 0 H0 : is_lim_seq (fun n : nat => Rabs (a (S n) / a n)) 0 Unable to unify "exists l : R_NormedModule, is_series ?M2363 l" with "CV_radius a = p_infty".

In environment H1 : forall a : nat -> R, ex_series (fun n : nat => Rabs (a n)) -> ex_series a a : nat -> R H : forall n : nat, a n = 0 -> False H0 : is_lim_seq (fun n : nat => Rabs (a (S n) / a n)) 0 Unable to unify "is_lim_seq (fun n : nat => Rabs (a (S n) / a n)) 0" with "CV_radius a = p_infty".

original: intros H H0. unfold CV_disk. eapply ex_series_Rabs. apply H0.
